hints.content:
Let's use place value blocks to build each number and see which ones equal $\purpleD{3}\blueE4\maroonD2$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/daedfd136818d11160af995c4e03b9252973164e)

$\purpleD3$ hundreds $+~\maroonD4$ ones$+~\maroonD2$ ones

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/3204872216b569c8bf9736cfe02ccd4137dc298b)

$\purpleD{300} + \maroonD{4} + \maroonD2  = \purpleD{300} + \maroonD{6}  = 306$

$\purpleD3$ hundreds $+~\maroonD4$ ones$+~\maroonD2$ ones$\neq342$

$\purpleD2$ hundreds $+~\blueE{14}$ tens $+~\maroonD2$ ones

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e45183ee10f92876d49840d1c0370320891a7a8c)

$\purpleD{200} + \blueE{140} + \maroonD2 = 342$

$\purpleD2$ hundreds $+~\blueE{14}$ tens $+~\maroonD2$ ones$=342$

These expressions are equivalent to $342$:

* $3$ hundreds $+~42$ tens
* $2$ hundreds $+14$ tens $+2$ ones

question.content:
**Which expressions represent the same amount as $342$?**

[[☃ radio 1]]
